Message:
Feelings cannot be seen.
That’s why we all give presents.

Each one filled to the brim
with our feelings.

Giving a present and
sharing your feelings
are one in the same.
That’s why...

I stood on stage,
holding a large, round,
black bread high above my head.

A hard, nearly tasteless,
plain, and simple bread.

“This was the first bread
I ever baked.

I burned it back then,
but my big sis told me
that she could taste
the kindness I put into it.”

“Even though I’ve improved
a lot since then, and can bake
even fancier bread now,

my big sis says she still
loves this bread the most.

Because it’s the first one
I ever baked.”

“Whenever I see that smile
on her face, her kindness
makes my heart so full...”

“This bread is hard, and doesn’t
really taste like anything.

But, for my sister and me,
it’s something that fills us
with more warmth than
any fancy gift ever could.
It’s a bread full of memories.”

In that moment, I heard a faint
sound of clapping from behind.

As I turned around, there was
that lady, clapping with
a big smile on her face.

Hehe...! It looks like
my feelings resonated
with everyone too.
